Translations.Text: Kaom Aikah pih peusulet Rasul Han jitem kaboi peue nyang geupeugah
Geukheun le Syuʻib ubak awak nyan Pakon gata han takwa keu Allah
Lon nyoe bit Rasul jeuet tapeucaya
Teuma takwa gata keu Allah Tataʻat keu lon nyang Rasul gata
Hana bak gata lon lakee upah Upah lon ka na bak Po dum alam
Teuma sukatan bek tapeusalah Beu santeut are ‘oh tabloe peubloe Bek tapeurugoe dum hamba Allah
Ngon ceng nyang beutoi watee tatimang Bek miyup manyang on ceng dua blah
Barang-barang gop bek tapeukureueng Buet nyan that hareuem beu tapeusiblah Bek peubuet jeuheut di dalam bumoe
Takwa jinoe laju keu Allah Tuhan nyang peujeuet gata nyoe bandum Angkatan jameun pih hana ubah Ureueng nyang dilee pih Tuhan peujeuet
Jiseuot leugat peue roe tapeugah Ka jipeusihe gata uroe nyoe
Gata ngon kamoe kon saban leupah Gata ngon kamoe sit manusia Meukira gata sang sulet leupah
Peurhot bak kamoe geureupeng langet Meu beuna keubit peue nyang tapeugah
Geukheun Tuhan lon bandum Neuteupeue Buetteuh beurangpeue Neuteupeue sudah
Jikheun treuk sulet Syuʻib Rasul jih Geuazeueb treuk jih nyang brat sileupah Uroe meuawan uroe kiamat Haro hara that hana ban peugah
Atra nyan bandum pih jeuet keu tanda € Allah Taʻala kuasa leupah Teuma le that jih han jimeuiman Hana atra nyan jitueng phaedah
Keubit Po gata Maha Peurkasa Lom pih Po gata Maha Peumurah
